prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand, chibi proportions with large geometric translucent edges head with unique hexagonal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying perfect. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, dodecahedron, vesica_piscis patterns, styled with Power commands influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Silver and neutral grey inspired by mercurial ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns fused with wu wei minimalist garments and taiji pattern sashes with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, incorporating Natural silk for flow, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and hexagonal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals combined with Bagua mirror with perfect spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor TOCARZI's profile: 'He of such equality', Aethyr TAN, Air element, Tarot Justice, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Libra, embodying the essence: 'In TOCARZI's presence, all things regain their equilibrium an invisible scale seems to bring every situation into fair and perfect balance.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand
visual_elements.head_shape: large geometric translucent edges head with unique hexagonal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with geometric facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying perfect
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, dodecahedron, vesica_piscis patterns, styled with Power commands influences

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns fused with wu wei minimalist garments and taiji pattern sashes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, incorporating Natural silk for flow
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals combined with Bagua mirror
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He of such equality'
profile_data.essence: In TOCARZI's presence, all things regain their equilibrium an invisible scale seems to bring every situation into fair and perfect balance.
profile_data.angelic_role: Power of Scales of Mercy; commands empyrean spirits.
profile_data.form_description: A living geometric construct of translucent quartz-like substance, representing the precise balance of Justice, with edges that shift between razor-sharp clarity and fluid mercurial transformation
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silver represents Air element's mercurial nature, Mercury's fluid intelligence, and Libra's balanced scales; white symbolizes purity of judgment and spiritual clarity
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagon represents perfect geometric harmony, dodecahedron connects to divine ordering of universe, Vesica Piscis symbolizes generative balance between polarities
